awards.description: THIS AGREEMENT PROVIDES ASSISTANCE TO THE YSLETA DEL SUR PUEBLO TO BUILD ITS CAPACITY TO ADMINISTER ENVIRONMENTAL PROGRAMS ON INDIAN LANDS. SPECIFICALLY, THE RECIPIENT WILL CONDUCT ENVIRONMENTAL OUTREACH, TRACK SPECIAL WASTE AND RECYCLING COLLECTIONS, AND BUILD CAPACITY OF STAFF THROUGH RESEARCH AND TRAININGS RELATED TO ASTM, HAZWOPER, SOLID WASTE, ENERGY STAR PORTFOLIO MANAGER, EMISSIONS INVENTORIES, AND AIR QUALITY MONITORING.

DESCRIPTION:THIS AGREEMENT PROVIDES ASSISTANCE TO THE YSLETA DEL SUR PUEBLO TO BUILD ITS CAPACITY TO ADMINISTER ENVIRONMENTAL PROGRAMS ON INDIAN LANDS. ACTIVITIES:SPECIFICALLY, THE RECIPIENT WILL BUILD CAPACITY BY PROVIDING COMMUNITY OUTREACH, IMPLEMENT POLLUTION PREVENTION STRATEGIES, CONTINUE TO INCREASE AWARENESS ON ENERGY CONSUMPTION AND ATTEND ENVIRONMENTAL TRAININGS.SUBRECIPIENT:NO SUBAWARDS ARE INCLUDED IN THIS ASSISTANCE AGREEMENT.OUTCOMES:QUARTERLY PROGRESS REPORTS, ANNUAL FINAL FINANCIAL REPORT, QUALITY MANAGEMENT PLAN, AND GEOGRAPHIC INFORMATION SYSTEM/GLOBAL POSITIONING SYSTEM, QUALITY ASSESSMENT PROJECT PLAN. THE INTENDED BENEFICIARY IS THE YSLETA DEL SUR PUEBLO
